name: Into The Uncertain Abyss
description:
WEBGL WARNING: Quest Items may be invisible since they do not glow!

Into The Uncertain Abyss centers around gathering the keys to the evil sorcerer's portals and taking him down for good.

Explore the Canyon and gather keys, herbs, and ores. Complete side quests, Level up, earn gold to upgrade your gear. Controls:

WASD: Movement

TAB: Opens up the Inventory/Quest/Character Sheet screen.

Left Click: Attack

Q: Magic Spell

Left Click On Item in Inventory: Use the item.

E: Interact

UPDATE CHANGELOG:

Fixed Main Quest bugs.
Fixed sound bugs.
Fixed UI bugs
